author: Samuel Lovett, Samuel Lovett
title: Coronavirus: China approves two experimental vaccines to enter human trials
description: World Health Organisation says at least 20 different Covid-19 vaccines being worked on across globe
content:
Pharmaceutical groups in Britain and China have taken crucial steps forward in the development of vaccines and treatments for coronavirus.
While China approved early-stage human tests for two experimental vaccines on Tuesday, according to state media Xinhua,… [+3755 chars]
